scene.name: intro
scene.line: I don't know what I expected.

scene.name: strangers
scene.line: Kind of vague already, isn't it? Donald's a stranger. Hell, you and I are practically strangers.

scene.name: dead-end
scene.line: Yeah. I'm starting to think that's our song.

scene.name: first-meeting
scene.line: Listen ... earlier, in the mine, I didn't want to talk about it, but ...
scene.option: You don't have to talk about it.
What did you find down there?

scene.name: dont-talk
scene.line: No, it's OK. I want to.

scene.name: what-shannon-saw
scene.line: When I saw Weaver ... she was on TV. I was testing a pretty simple tube repair, flipping through channels to check the saturation, and she was just `there`.
It was kind of horrible. I mean, I told you she disappeared? Suddenly? Ran away? But we thought ...
scene.option: What was she doing on TV?

scene.name: weaver-dead
scene.line: Yeah. I guess I don't like to say it.
Dead.

scene.name: weaver-on-tv
scene.line: That's the part that I can't ... I'd flipped past that channel a dozen times before in my tests. It was one of those public access things. Some old lady reading poetry.

scene.name: weaver-appearance
scene.line: And then, the next time I flipped to channel two ... Weaver.
It's burned in my vision, now. She's standing in a room. The walls are a blank kind of gray. There's tape on the walls, like markings. And desks ... a classroom, maybe?
The camera is in the corner so it's this sort of forty-five degree angle into the room, and there's Weaver right in the center of the picture.
I stopped turning the dial ... hell, I think I stopped `breathing`. Eventually, she spoke, but there was no real sound — just this awful hum. I read the closed captions.
She said to go to the mine. I'd `find` something there. I can't remember her exact words. Whenever I try, I get ... distracted. Fuzzy. I —
`(SHANNON coughs into her sleeve.)`
It's so dusty in here, right?

scene.name: is-dusty
scene.line: You'd think, with all these holes in the ceiling —

scene.name: not-dusty
scene.line: Maybe it's me. I'm kind of allergic to —

scene.name: loud-sound
scene.line: What the hell was that? Did you hear that?
scene.option: Must have been the church settling.
